description:
After seeing Senpai get mocked for his inability to run, Nagatoro takes him out jogging to try to whip him into shape. The culture festival is coming up, and Senpai needs something to present for the arts club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpaitte Karada, Katasou Desu yo ne / Yatte Yarimasu yo, Senpai!!
T`as pas l`air souple / Mets-en-lui plein la vue !
You Seem Pretty Stiff, Senpai / I`ll Do It for You, Senpai!!
センパイって体, 硬そーですよねぇ / やってやりますよ, センパイ!!
